category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Election Method)
contents: Article 8 (Method of Election) ① The chairperson must be appointed by the chairman and receive the consent of the board of directors. Revised December 26, 2022. ② The vice-chairman, honorary secretary, and standing committee members are elected from among the committee members. ③ Committee members are appointed by the chairman. ④ When there is a vacancy in the standing committee, the person recommended by the chairman shall be elected by the standing committee, and this shall be reported to the next general meeting of committee members. ⑤ In order to minimize the possibility of unfair intervention by interested parties in the deliberation and resolution process of the committee by diagnosing the work ethics of the appointed member in advance, the appointed member must prepare and submit Form No. 1 and Form No. 2. do. Newly established on December 26, 2022. [Moved from Article 6, previous Article 8 moved to Article 10 on May 15, 2017] [Fully revised on May 15, 2017]
